13799.<pc>の 持っている\n『超天遊戯－参の書－』が 光り始めた！:
The Choten Yugi: Book Three in <pc>'s
possession has begun to glow!

13800.白紙だったページに 文字が浮かびあがってくる。\n<pc>は その文字を読んだ。:
The blank page is now filled with words.
<pc> read the letters.

13801.なんじゃ ここも見つかってしまったか。\n……まあよいわ。修行の続きといくぞ。\:
So they found us here, too? ...Oh well. Let's continue our training. Let's give a kick to the martial artist who relies too much on
weapons.

13802.この辺りをうろつく魔物 <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を\n素手で 倒してくる:
You must defeat Trickstar, the monster that
roams around here, with your bare hands. No
weapons or shields are allowed!

13803.それと 聞きあきたかもしれんが 素手で倒したら\nその戦いを勝って終わらせなけれ:
And in case you're tired of hearing this, if you beat them with your bare hands, you have to win the fight to end it. So go out there
and defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> of them!

13804.「やはり……。修行を進めていたのは\n ヤーン様ではなく あなたでしたか。:
As I thought... it was you, not Mr. Yarn, who
was promoting the training.

13805.「先日は ごあいさつできず 失礼しました。\n 私はヤーン様の従者 ガウラドと申:
I apologize for not greeting you the other
day. My name is Gaurad, a follower of Master
Yarn. I hope to make your acquaintance.

13806.「きっと あなたは 何も知らされずに\n その修行を やっているのでしょうね。:
Steel Lance, I am sure you are doing this
practice without any knowledge of what you are
doing.

13807.「超天道士の名を継ぐための修行を\n 他人にやらせるとは……。\n まったく ヤ:
I can't believe they let someone else do the
training to carry on the name of Choten
Doshi... What was Master Yarn thinking?

13808.「私も超天道士にあこがれ 弟子入りを望んだ者。\n 代われるものなら 代わりたい:
I, too, longed to be a supernaturalist and
wished to become an apprentice. If I could
replace him, I would.

13809.「いや 失礼しました……。\n それでは また お会いしましょう。: No, excuse me... we will see each other again.

13854.「<pc>殿が そのような顔をなさるのは\n 私のせいです ヤーン様。:
It is my fault that <pc> makes such a
face, Master Yarn.

13855.「ガウラド？ なんだ～ どういうことだ。\n 次の本を 持ってきてくれたんじゃな:
Gaurad? What~ What do you mean? Didn't you
bring me the next book~?

13856.「私が 次の書を持ってきたとして\n その書の修行を果たすのは あなたではなく\:
So if I bring you the next book, it will be
<pc>, not you, who will fulfill the
practice of that book?

13857.「あちゃ～。バレちまったのか～。: Oh no! I've been found out~.

13858.「あなたは 伝説の武闘家である 超天道士様が\n その生涯で 唯一の弟子と認めた:
You are a legendary martial artist, the one
whom Master Chotenji recognized as his only
disciple in his entire life.

13859.「だというのに 超天道士様の死後\n あなたは 遊んでばかり……。:
And yet, ever since the death of the Cho-
Tendo-sama, all you do is play...

13860.「そのあなたが ようやく\n 超天道士様の名を継ぐ覚悟を決めたのかと\n 私は:
I was delighted to see that you had finally
made up your mind to take over the name of
Choutenshi-sama.

13861.「何度も 言ってきたはずだ。\n オレは超天道士の名になんか 興味ない。\n だ:
I have told you many times. I'm not interested
in the name of Choutei. That's why I wanted
him to take over.

13862.「悪いな～ <pc>。\n だますつもりじゃ なかったんだ。:
I'm sorry <pc>. I didn't mean to
trick you.

13863.「アンタは オレよりも 超天道士の名を継ぐのに\n ふさわしいヤツだと 思ったん:
I thought you were more worthy than I to carry
on the name of Chotenkyoji.

13864.「それは まちがいです。\n あなたは <pc>殿を 大変なことに\n 巻き込ん:
You are mistaken. You have gotten
<pc> into a lot of trouble.

13865.「まちがい～？ 巻き込んだって 何にだよ？: Am I wrong? Involved in what?

13866.「このままでは 死にます。: If this continues, I will die.

13868.「次の書……最後の書の名は 死の書。\n 生きるか死ぬかの 死の文字を冠する書で:
The next and final book, is called the Book of
Death. It is a book that bears the words "To
live or die".

13869.「だが 修行を進めているのは コイツだぜ～。\n ということは 死ぬのは コイツ:
But he's the one who's training to be the
best. Which means he's the one who's going to
die, right?

13870.「そうです。<pc>殿は\n 超天遊戯の書の修行を 後戻りの\n できないところ:
Yes, it is true. <pc> has advanced
his practice of the Book of Choten Yugi to the
point of no return...

13871.「参の書までの修行を終えた <pc>殿は \n すでに 超天道士様のチカラの多く:
After completing the training up to the Book of San, is already in a state in which he has acquired much of the power of the
Chotenji-sama.

13872.「その状態の者が 最後の修行を果たせず\n 超天道士の名を継げなかった場合\n:
If a person in that state fails to complete their final training and does not carry on the name of Chotendoji, their body cannot
withstand its reckless inner power...

13873.「行きつく先は……死あるのみ。\n <pc>殿が その運命から\n 逃れることは:
The only end... is death. There is no way for
<pc> to escape that fate.

13875.「……わかった。オレが なんとかする。\n 死の書をよこせ ガウラド。:
I'll take care of it. I'll take care of it.
Give me the Book of Death, Gaurad.

13876.「私は持っていません。死の書が どこにあるかは\n ご自身で探されると よいでし:
I don't have it. You will have to find the
Book of Death yourself.

13877.「超天道士様の弟子である ヤーン様ならば\n 見つけるのは たやすいことかと。:
As a disciple of Heavenly Warrior Yarn, he
should be easy to find.

13878.「では 私は これで。: Well then, I'll take my leave.

13879.「今の話を 信じられないって顔してるな～。:
You look like you can't believe what you just
heard!

13880.「ガウラドは ウソをつかない男だ。\n なによりも あの超天道士の じ～さんなら:
Gaurad is a man who never lies. Above all, he
is a man who would do anything for his
supernatural master.

13881.「ヤベ～。昔の記憶が よみがえってきやがる。\n オレも いろいろ ひで～目にあ:
Oh no! It's bringing back old memories. I've
been through a lot of terrible things myself.

13882.「……まあ～ それは 置いといてだ。\n とにかく アンタには 修行を\n 続け:
Well~ let's put that aside. Anyway, it looks
like you'll have to continue your training.

13883.「いい装備がなきゃ きついかもしれね～。\n コレを 受け取っておいてくれ。:
It might be tough without good equipment.
Here, take this.

13884.「役に立つかは わからね～が\n コレを 受け取っておいてくれ。:
I don't know if this will help you, but here,
take it.

13885.「オレは 死の書を探してみる。\n 心当たりも あるっちゃ～ あるんだ。:
I'm going to look for the Book of Death. I
have an idea of what I'm looking for.

13886.「すぐに 見つけてくるからさ。\n 後で 武闘家になって また来てくれ。\n す:
I'll find you soon. Come back later as a
martial artist. Sorry about that...
<pc>...

24451.「責任は ヤーン様にあるのですよ。\n 超天道士の名とは それほどに\n 重たい:
The responsibility lies with Yarn-sama. The
name of Chotenkyoji is such a weighty one.
